statements: SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, evaluation_date FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, performance_score FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT DISTINCT evaluator_id FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluator_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, evaluation_date, performance_score FROM employee_performance_evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC, performance_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC, performance_score ASC;
SELECT evaluation_date, feedback FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluator_id = 4 AND performance_score >= 8.0;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM employee_performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id HAVING AVG(performance_score) > 7.5 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT MAX(evaluation_date) AS latest_evaluation_date, COUNT(DISTINCT evaluator_id) AS unique_evaluators FROM employee_performance_evaluations;

SELECT evaluator_id, COUNT(evaluation_id) AS evaluations_count, SUM(performance_score) AS total_score FROM employee_performance_evaluations GROUP BY evaluator_id ORDER BY evaluations_count DESC, total_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceEvaluations;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, performance_rating FROM EmployeePerformanceEvaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_id, hire_date FROM Employees ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceEvaluations WHERE reviewer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceEvaluations WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT e.name, ep.performance_rating FROM Employees AS e INNER JOIN EmployeePerformanceEvaluations AS ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id WHERE ep.performance_rating > 3;
SELECT e.department, COUNT(ep.evaluation_id) AS evaluation_count FROM Employees AS e LEFT JOIN EmployeePerformanceEvaluations AS ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id GROUP BY e.department;
SELECT AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating, position FROM EmployeePerformanceEvaluations GROUP BY position HAVING avg_rating > 4;

SELECT e.name, ep.evaluation_date FROM Employees AS e JOIN EmployeePerformanceEvaluations AS ep ON e.employee_id = ep.employee_id WHERE e.department = 'Sales' AND ep.reviewer_id = 201 ORDER BY ep.evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department='IT';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department, hire_date FROM Employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Evaluation WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, d.department_name FROM Employee e JOIN Department d ON e.department = d.department_name;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department='HR';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Employee WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM Employee ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, department FROM Evaluation JOIN Employee ON Evaluation.employee_id = Employee.employee_id GROUP BY department;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM Employee JOIN Department ON Employee.department = Department.department_name GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee WHERE hire_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Evaluation ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT e.name, d.name AS department FROM Employee e JOIN Department d ON e.department = d.department_id;
SELECT m.manager_id, e.name AS manager_name, d.name AS department_name FROM Manager m JOIN Employee e ON m.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN Department d ON e.department = d.department_id;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department='HR';
SELECT name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT e.name, d.name AS department FROM Employee e JOIN Department d ON e.department = d.name WHERE e.hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT e.name, ev.evaluation_date, ev.performance_score FROM Employee e JOIN Evaluation ev ON e.employee_id = ev.employee_id WHERE ev.performance_score >= 80 ORDER BY ev.evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT e.name, m.manager_id FROM Employee e LEFT JOIN Manager m ON e.employee_id = m.employee_id ORDER BY m.manager_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT department_name FROM departments WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT manager_name, department_name FROM managers JOIN departments ON managers.department_id = departments.department_id;
SELECT evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM evaluations WHERE evaluation_score > 80 ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='Sales' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01' AND hire_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT e.name, d.department_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.department_name;
SELECT e.name, SUM(f.evaluation_score) AS total_score FROM employees e JOIN evaluations f ON e.id = f.employee_id GROUP BY e.name;
SELECT m.manager_name, d.department_name FROM managers m JOIN departments d ON m.department_id = d.department_id ORDER BY m.manager_name ASC;
